elements.caption: Drop Shipment
elements.description: Drop Shipments are sent from the Vendor directly to the Customer

elements.caption: Target Document Type
elements.description: Target document type for conversing documents

elements.caption: No.
elements.description: Document sequence number of the document

elements.caption: Order Reference
elements.description: Transaction Reference Number (Sales Order, Purchase Order) of your Business Partner

elements.caption: Sales partner required
elements.description: Specifies for a bill partner whether a sales partner has to be specified in a sales order.

elements.caption: Creditpass Status
elements.description: Zeigt an, ob das Creditpass-Status erfolgreich ist oder nicht und ob er benötigt wird oder nicht, für die ausgewählte Zahlungsweise

tabs.caption: Order Line
tabs.emptyResultHint: You can create them in this window.

elements.caption: Not avail. on short term
elements.description: Color to use when flagging sale order lines where the current stock minus foreseeable shipments is not sufficient to fulfill the ordered quantity.

elements.caption: Quantity
elements.description: The Quantity Entered is based on the selected UoM

elements.caption: Available at short notice
elements.description: Current stock minus foreseeable shipments in the respective product's stocking UOM.

elements.caption: Price
elements.description: Price Entered - the price based on the selected/base UoM

elements.caption: Invoicing based on
elements.description: Legt fest wie die abrechenbare Menge ermittelt wird, wenn die tatsächlich gelieferte Menge von der mominal gelieferten Menge abweicht.

elements.caption: Line Amount
elements.description: Line Extended Amount (Quantity * Actual Price) without Freight and Charges

elements.caption: Ertrag netto
elements.description: Effektiver Preis pro Einheit, minus erwartetem Skonto und vertraglicher Rückerstattung.

elements.caption: Marge %
elements.description: Differenz zwischen VK Ertrag und EK Ertrag.

elements.caption: No Price Conditions Indicator
elements.description: Red means that mandatory pricing conditions are missing; yellow means that temporary pricing conditions were created just for the respective position.

elements.caption: Zahlungsbedingung
elements.description: Die Bedingungen für die Bezahlung dieses Vorgangs

tabs.caption: Order Tax
tabs.emptyResultHint: You can create them in this window.

elements.caption: Tax base Amount
elements.description: Base for calculating the tax amount

elements.caption: Price includes Tax
elements.description: Tax is included in the price

elements.caption: Whole Tax
elements.description: If this flag is set, in a tax aware document (e.g. Invoice, Order) this tax will absorb the whole amount, leaving 0 for base amount

tabs.caption: Components of the Manufacturing Order
tabs.emptyResultHint: You can create them in this window.

elements.caption: Quantity
elements.description: The Quantity Entered is based on the selected UoM

elements.caption: Is %
elements.description: Indicate that this component is based in % Quantity

elements.caption: Quantity
elements.description: Indicate the Quantity  use in this BOM

elements.caption: Quantity in %
elements.description: Indicate the Quantity % use in this Formula

elements.caption: % Scrap
elements.description: Indicate the Scrap %  for calculate the Scrap Quantity

elements.caption: Component Type
elements.description: Component Type for a Bill of Material or Formula

elements.caption: Issue Method
elements.description: There are two methods for issue the components to Manufacturing Order

elements.caption: Active
elements.description: The record is active in the system
